registryVersion.description: Version of the registry schema implemented by this document.

components.description: Graph nodes describing deployable or documentable units.

owners.description: Directory of accountable teams that may be referenced by components.

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the component.

version.description: Semantic version of the component metadata.

description.description: Optional short description of the component.

files.description: Source files associated with the component.

dependencies.description: IDs of other components this component depends on.

owners.description: IDs of owner records responsible for the component.

tags.description: Optional classification tags used by tooling.

links.description: Optional map of named external references (dashboards, repos, etc.).

name.description: Human readable team or individual name.

contacts.description: Contact handles for escalation (emails, chat channels, etc.).

description.description: Optional detail about the owner scope.
